Container.Name: ddns-updater
Container.DonateText: This app and docker were generously made by qmcgaw. If you like the project please consider making a donation toward his efforts and check out the MANY other projects he has created on GitHub.

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Timezone to have accurate times, i.e. America/Montreal

Config.Name: PUBLICIP_FETCHERS
Config.Description: Comma separated fetcher types to obtain the public IP address from http and dns

Config.Name: PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS
Config.Description:
PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 or IPv6 address. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), opendns, ifconfig, ipinfo, ddns, google.
You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

Config.Name: PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS
Config.Description:
PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 address only. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), ipify, noip.
You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

Config.Name: PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS
Config.Description:
PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv6 address only. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), ipify, noip.
You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

Config.Name: PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS
Config.Description: PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 address only or IPv6 address only or one of them. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), google, cloudflare,

Config.Name: PUBLICIP_DNS_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: Public IP DNS query timeout (in seconds)

Config.Name: UPDATE_COOLDOWN_PERIOD
Config.Description: Duration to cooldown between updates for each record. This is useful to avoid being rate limited or banned. (in minutes)

Config.Name: HTTP_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: Timeout for all HTTP requests (in seconds)

Config.Name: BACKUP_DIRECTORY
Config.Description: Directory to read and write data files from internally

Config.Name: BACKUP_PERIOD
Config.Description: Set to a period (i.e. 72h15m) to enable zip backups of data/config.json and data/updates.json in a zip file

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Level of logging, debug, info, warning or error

Config.Name: ROOT_URL
Config.Description: URL path to append to all paths to the webUI (i.e. /ddns for accessing https://example.com/ddns through a proxy)

Config.Name: SHOUTRRR_ADDRESSES
Config.Description: (optional) Comma separated list of Shoutrrr addresses (notification services) -- (See GitHub Documentation)
